title: Gore Sound Effects - Audio Pack
description: Make your gore effects come to life with this sounds! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


By purchasing this pack you automatically have access to over 300 gore files and nearly 50 folders of gore content, bones breaking, blood spurting, characters being dented, heads exploding, biting and much more! :D


Don't get attached to the name

It is important to point out that I named the folders and organized the files according to the visual reference when I created them, however you can easily use the files for other functions, for example "cut off the head" can be any member of the body, in fact, this example applies to all folders and files.


Big variety

You get the main file as shown in the video, and the layers I used to make it, then you buy a pack of gore, but it also takes whooshes, explosions, sword attacks, bites, impacts, and more, making this one very useful and complete pack.


Bonus Folder and Mockup

You will also take a Bonus folder and the Mockup folders, these are folders that I used to create the sound effects, the files are treated and I haven't synced them with any video, you can use them to create your own effects!


Helping each other

By purchasing the package you help me to continue bringing quality content at a very nice price to the developer community, in advance, thank you very much for reading this far! :D


Check the preview

Horror Bundle - Sound Effects in Sound Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)


Don't worry! This package will still receive updates :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 670

Number of Audio Cues: 670

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100Hz

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay/unsplash.
